sys_ux_client_script.name: Set field dirty

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_e2ac0f47c3aab11011971d4ce0013113
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">5996a635c3a2791011971d4ce00131a9</macroponent><name>Set field dirty</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event 
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
  const { deductions } = api.state.machine.context; 
  const { index } = api.item;
  deductions[index].dirty = true;
  api.setState('machine', {
    ...api.state.machine,
    context: {
      ...api.state.machine.context,
      deductions
    }
  });
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Milton.Jones@employbridge.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-11-21 13:30:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>e2ac0f47c3aab11011971d4ce0013113</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set field dirty</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Voluntary Deductions" source="x_ebh_voluntary_0">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Voluntary Deductions">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_e2ac0f47c3aab11011971d4ce0013113</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Milton.Jones@employbridge.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-13 20:32:11</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
